row.Docu: It escapes the Cloud Foundry input parameters and wrap the parameter surrounded by quotes(").

row.process: ! Escape double-quotes : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_TRIM("&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '\', '\\') : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"') ! Add double-quotes to String to preserve spaces in value : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT('"', &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#) : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"')
